Verify it is enabled
Verify the 'Previous Page' button is enabled
Verify the current page number '2' is selected with font weight 700
Confirm each page button has a width of 30px, height 30px, and border 1px solid #007BFF
Focus on the search bar
Verify its border becomes 2px solid #007BFF
Verify its placeholder 'Search products...' remains visible
Verify its right margin is 15px
Confirm its width is 400px
Confirm its text color is #333333
Hover over the 'Services' menu item
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned directly below 'Services' at y 60px, has a background color #F9F9F9, width 200px, opacity 1 and padding 8px
Verify the footer 'Privacy Policy' link has text color #666666, font size 13px, font weight 400, no border, x position 20px from the left edge and a right margin of 10px
Check the overall footer background color is #F2F2F2
In the image gallery, click the third thumbnail
Verify the main image source changes to 'gallery_image_3.jpg', its rendered dimensions are 800x600px, and its load time is under 300ms
Confirm the selected thumbnail has a 2px solid #007BFF border
Expand the first accordion item 'Product Features'
Verify its content area becomes visible and its height expands to 150px
Verify the header's background color changes to #EAEAEA
Confirm the expand icon rotates 180 degrees via a 200ms transition
Observe the file upload progress bar
Verify its width increases smoothly, its background color is #4CAF50, and its text content '75%' is displayed
Confirm the progress bar container has a border radius of 5px and height of 10px
Hover over the 'Info' icon

Verify a tooltip appears with text 'More information about this item', a background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, border radius 4px, positioned 10px below the icon and has a padding of 5px 8px
Verify the success notification message 'Item added to cart successfully!' appears at the top right (x 90%, y 20px), has a background color #4CAF50, text color #FFFFFF, and an opacity of 1
Confirm it disappears after 3 seconds via an animation
On the map widget, pan the map
Verify the scroll-left and scroll-top positions change
Verify the map tiles are fully loaded within 1 second
Verify the zoom level indicator text color is #333333
Confirm the map container's width is 600px and height 400px
Click the 'Share on Twitter' button
Verify it changes to a disabled state for 500ms
Verify its background color becomes #A2D9F7
Verify its icon's shape remains a bird
Confirm its font size is 14px and padding is 8px 15px
Select '2023-10-26' from the date picker
Verify the input field's value updates to '10/26/2023', its text color is #000000, and its border is 1px solid #007BFF
Confirm the date picker dropdown becomes hidden
Verify its aria-label 'Selected Date' is correct
